alert.note: Alert for Barranquitas; Ciales; Jayuya; Juana Diaz; Orocovis; Ponce; Villalba (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 19 at 3:25PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Barranquitas, Ciales, Jayuya, Juana Diaz, Orocovis, Ponce and Villalba. * WHEN...Until 530 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 225 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ponce, Jayuya, Villalba, Juana Diaz, Orocovis, Ciales, Barranquitas, Guayabal, Luis Llorens Torres, Coto Laurel, Aguilita, Capitanejo, Potala Pastillo, Rio Canas Abajo, Marueno and Playita Cortada. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Barranquitas; Ciales; Jayuya; Juana Diaz; Orocovis; Ponce; Villalba
